name: Expanded Senses
summary: Your eidolon evolves more acute senses.
description:
Your eidolon evolves more acute senses. Your eidolon gains low-light vision and darkvision, as well as scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.Traits

Evolution: Feats with this trait affect your eidolon instead of you, typically by granting it additional physical capabilities.
